location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 461 x 328mm, on sheet 507 x 366mm

mods.abstract: Map of north-eastern Oman showing the locations of the principal tribes. A table of reference indicates that the letters given in parentheses after the tribal name denote the confederacy to which they belong (e.g. 'G' for Ghafiri). Produced by the Foreign Office's Research Department. Scale not given.
